english.segment1: Come on. I wanna love, I wish you'd turn me around. When you climbed up the trees. Because of kicks in the knees. That's all. And I know that's not what life's all about. When you hid in the leaves. And got stung by the bees
english.segment2: Come on and be with me. I want your company
english.segment3: Come on. I wanna love, I wish you'd turn me around. You know what we need. I know how to read
english.segment4: Come on and be with me. I want your company
